name_title: Alfred Dunner® Essential Pull On Capri Pant
description: You'll return to our Alfred Dunner pull-on capris again and again when you want an updated, casual look and all the comfort you love.   elastic waistband approx. 19-21" inseam slash pockets polyester washable imported

Reviews.Review: You never have to worry about the fit...Alfred Dunner clothing sizes are true to size and fits perfectly. Great value for the money.
Good quality fabric. Perfect fit. Washed very well no iron.

I do not normally wear pants or capris that have an elastic waist, but I decided to try these since they were on sale and I loved the color. I was very surprised at how comfortable they are and wear really well even wearing all day. I will buy this style again!
I love these capris! They fit true to size and are so comfortable to wear. I am planning to order more of them.
This product is very comfortable and the fabric launders very well
I did not like the fabric. It is 100% polyester I thought it was different.I bought one at the store apprx two monts ago, and I thought it was just like it
What a great deal. Beautiful Pants. Its more than I expected.
Alfred Dunner has great pants, good fit and very comfortable

name_title: Alfred Dunner® Feels Like Spring 3/4 Sleeve Leaf Print Top
description: For easygoing style you'll love, wear our stretch-knit print top. v-neck 3/4 sleeves 26¾" length cotton/spandex machine wash, line dry imported

Reviews.Review: I loved the quality and price but it seems Alfred Dunner tops runwide, I ordered a small and it was too big and normally a smallor medium would fit me.

After months of shopping and looking for something that you dont need to wear layers such as you would wear with a see through top, I finally found a top that is soft, not revealing, colorful, and comfortable. The price is more then I would have liked to spend but I feel that one top that meets my requirements as compared to 6 tops that I dont feel good about makes all the difference. I finally found a clothing line that is geared toward middle age instead of young girls.
This style of Alfred Dunner tops is always comfortable to wear whether it is a cotton type like this one, or a polyester top to wear as business casual to work.
Very good quality! Love the fabric! Easy care! Size is accurate!

name_title: Alfred Dunner® Feels Like Spring 3/4-Sleeve Leaf Striped Tee - Plus
description: Spring is in the air with our 3/4-sleeve leaf striped tee, which is comfortable, versatile and stylish, making it an easy addition to your warm-weather wardrobe. v-neck pullover 26¾" length cotton/spandex machine wash, line dry imported

Reviews.Review: The colors and quality of the fabric were fine, I just didnt care for the loose cut leaves around the front of the neckline, wish they had omitted that in the design. Returned it.

name_title: Alfred Dunner® Feels Like Spring 3/4-Sleeve Watercolor Print Shirt or Pull-On Cargo Capris

Reviews.Review: I love the way these capri pants look and feel. The material is very nice.
This flattering blouse was a hit when I wore it to a recent event..... MANY compliments on the colors and style. Would like to see this offered in other combinations!

name_title: Alfred Dunner® Feels Like Spring Capris
description: Pull on a pair of our casual capris and be footloose and fancy-free. flat front straight leg high rise back elastic side pockets 16 7/8-19" inseam cotton/polyester/spandex washable imported

Reviews.Review: These capris are very comfortable, with just the right amount of spandex for stretch. I love the cute cuff on the bottom. I bought these for vacation to go with the Lime Green Sao Paolo top. Look very cute, and dressier than just a tee and jeans.Love me some Dunner !
Comfortable and lightweight material for summer wear. Love the button accent.
I was disappointed in the quality upon closer inspection at home.
I love Alfred Dunner pants and capris. These have more room in the hip and thigh area than other brands. I can wear a size 10 instead of a 12 because of this.
These Capris are so comfortable and fit great on me as I am a plus size. They are also nice enough to wear at my office.

name_title: Danny & Nicole® Sleeveless Lace Fit-and-Flare Dress
description: Featuring mixed fabrics and a figure-flattering silhouette, our sleeveless lace fit-and-flare dress is anything but ordinary. scoopneck back zip 40" length from shoulder cotton/nylon/polyester/spandex polyester lining hand wash, line dry imported

Reviews.Review: This is beautiful. It fit fantastic and flatters my curves. Highly recommend.
Purchased this dress for my daughter who is a size 8 its very pretty and flattering for the figure

name_title: Danny & Nicole® Sleeveless Lace Fit-and-Flare Dress
description: Elegant and flattering, you'll love showing off in our lace fit-and-flare dress. scoopneck back zipper sleeveless 37½" length from shoulder nylon/cotton polyester lining hand wash, line dry imported

Reviews.Review: I purchased this dress for my bridal shower and it is perfect. I love the color and cut. Very flattering.

name_title: Danny & Nicole® Sleeveless Lace Vertical Seam Fit-and-Flare Dress
description: Look darling in our sleeveless lace fit-and-flare dress, perfect for all your warm-weather gatherings. roundneck sleeveless exposed back zipper 38" length from shoulder lined lace polyester hand wash, line dry imported

Reviews.Review: I love this dress! At first, I wasnt sure about the nude lining, which you can see, through the lace. But its perfect! Fits well and flows great. Ill be wearing it to a wedding at the shore in August. Couldnt have asked for a better dress.

The dress fits perfectly and looks as it was pictured. I love the color of the lace with the beige underlay. I plan to wear it to my granddaughters wedding with beige lace flats and carry a beige half sweater in case I need something on my arms. Love it!!!
I purchased this for my daughter to wear under her graduation robe. She love it the moment she tried it on.....
Love the color, love the design, love the feel of the dress. A simply lovely dress.

name_title: Danny & Nicole® Sleeveless Mesh Shantung Polka Dot Fit-and-Flare Dress - Petite
description: Our absolutely charming fit-and-flare dress sings with plucky polka dots and a mesh yoke that's unstoppable.   scoopneck sleeveless exposed back zipper belt included approx. 36¼" length from shoulder lined polyester mesh yoke: polyester/spandex taffeta lining: polyester dry clean only imported

Reviews.Review: In love with that dress! This dress is elegant and chic, perfect for work or a cocktail.

name_title: Danny & Nicole® Sleeveless Polka Dot Chiffon Maxi Dress
description: Timeless polka dots and a flirty front keyhole give our sleeveless maxi dress the chic charm you adore. scoopneck sleeveless exposed back zipper 58" length from shoulder lined chiffon polyester machine wash, line dry imported

Reviews.Review: Cant wait to wear it for our sons wedding. It fits really well and will be a very comfortable for the days events.
Very cute dress. nice feel and comfort .I like the Maxi style dress; this dress can be worn in corporate america and to outdoor social events.
I bought this for my daughter, it is a very pretty, feminine dress. The styling of is so nice, love the chiffon overlay. The pleating on top will help as she is bigger on top. Just love it!
would look good on a younger woman who still has a waist. alas, I have lost mine. If you happen to find it, please return it.

name_title: Danny & Nicole® Sleeveless Polka Dot Fit-and-Flare Dress - Petite
description: Capture the casual elegance of the past in our modern fit-and-flare dress. roundneck sleeveless 35⅝" length from shoulder invisible zipper in back polyester dry clean only imported

Reviews.Review: The fabric of this dress is very stiff and scratchy, synthetic (luckily it is lined). The gathers at the waist tend to pouf out because of the stiffness of the fabric. I bought a petite size, but the torso length was too long. Since I liked the dress otherwise, I took the shoulders apart and deepened the seams.
Got this dress for summer wear. I am 5 4 and this dress fits me perfect. I usually wear a size 2 but I got the 4P size and this hits right at the knee and has a flattering fit.
The dress is very cute. It runs a little small. I would order the next size up.
I really like this dress. It fits perfectly, and the fab is high quality.

description: Look and feel your very best when you're in our sleeveless printed fit-and-flare dress by Danny Nicole. scoopneck 44" length from shoulder polyester/spandex washable imported

name_title: Danny & Nicole® Sleeveless Shantung Party Dress
description: Set the stage for show-stopping charm with our delightful striped and belted party dress. scoopneck sleeveless belt included back  zipper approx. 36¾" length from shoulder polyester lining: polyester machine wash, line dry imported

Reviews.Review: The fit is great. I love the color and the best part is that it was on clearance!
I had several compliments on this dress. Love it. good fit and nice colors.
The fabric feels like a polyester tablecloth... the color combination is unfortunately, not very flattering, so I returned this dress.

I loved the style of this dress but the fit was too small. Other dresses in the same size and style fit more TTS. This ran small. Also isnt lined on the bottom half of the dress which was disappointing.
This dress was a breath of fresh air and a welcoming to Spring. This is the best fitting dress I have purchased in a long time.
This is my church dress or out with my husband. Love the versatility.
I love this dress. It is comfortable, lovely, and appropriate for the office or going out on the town.

name_title: Danny & Nicole® Sleeveless Shantung Party Dress
description: Set the stage for show-stopping charm with our delightful striped and belted party dress. scoopneck sleeveless belt included back  zipper approx. 36¾" length from shoulder polyester lining: polyester machine wash, line dry imported

Reviews.Review: The fit is great. I love the color and the best part is that it was on clearance!
I had several compliments on this dress. Love it. good fit and nice colors.
The fabric feels like a polyester tablecloth... the color combination is unfortunately, not very flattering, so I returned this dress.

I loved the style of this dress but the fit was too small. Other dresses in the same size and style fit more TTS. This ran small. Also isnt lined on the bottom half of the dress which was disappointing.
This dress was a breath of fresh air and a welcoming to Spring. This is the best fitting dress I have purchased in a long time.
This is my church dress or out with my husband. Love the versatility.
I love this dress. It is comfortable, lovely, and appropriate for the office or going out on the town.

name_title: Danny & Nicole® Sleeveless Striped Colorblock Fit-and-Flare Dress
description: The chic colorblock design and flattering fit make our sleeveless fit-and-flare dress the perfect pick. scoopneck sleeveless exposed back zip 35¾" length from shoulder polyester/spandex machine wash, line dry imported

Reviews.Review: Love the colors and how it fits! The fabric was better than I thought.

description: Our absolutely charming fit-and-flare dress sings with bright stripes and a few contrast ones thrown in to add a lovely mystique.   squareneck sleeveless exposed back zipper belt included approx. 35" length from shoulder polyester washable imported

Reviews.Review: The style and fit are perfect. The colors are much more vibrant than shown. I love the light weight fabric which will be perfect for summer weather.

This dress looks really cute. The fabric is not comfortable at all. It has bumps in it with the design. Plus the dress doesnt look good on an older woman. It must be worn by someone in their 20s or younger.

name_title: Danny & Nicole® Sleeveless Striped Shantung Fit-and-Flare Dress - Petite
description: You'll be on their minds long after you've left in the vibrant hues of our striped shantung dress, complete with a grosgrain belt and exposed back zipper. extended shoulders exposed back zipper ribbon bow-belt 36½" length from shoulder shantung polyester lined machine wash, line dry imported

Reviews.Review: I was so happy to see the beautiful colors and fabric of this dress when I opened the box from my online purchase....but alas, it wouldnt even come close to zipping up! Very strange, as every other dress Ive ordered by Danny & Nicole has been true to size. Word to the wise: order one size up...but do order, because its a gorgeous dress!

name_title: Danny & Nicole® Sleeveless Stripe Fit-and-Flare Dress - Plus
description: Our figure-flattering fit-and-flare dress is designed in a bold stripe fabric with on-trend mixed materials. scoopneck sleeveless exposed zipper in back 43" length from shoulder polyester/spandex machine wash, line dry imported

Reviews.Review: Perfect for everyday wear to work. Love it. Able to dress down and dress up.

I received many compliments wearing this dress. It fit well and was very flattering. Washes well in cold water - low fluff in dryer and back on the hanger. No Muss - No Fuss. Im downsizing and (4 sizes - so far) I can always count on Danny and Nicole fashions to fit me well even as I transition out of plus sizes forever!!!!

I got this dress to wear to a wedding. It is very comfortable and very flattering. Im short 52 and the length of the dress hit me just right. The stripes do not make you look fat, somehow they are flattering. I will wear a lace shrug with it, and it looks great.
This dress was good quality, but the pattern and cut was NOT flattering at all.

name_title: Azul by Maxine of Hollywood Flyaway Tankini Swim Top
description: Go for bold with our black-and-white print tankini swim top featuring a flyaway front for maximum beach fun. soft cups partially lined nylon/LYCRA® spandex hand wash, line dry imported

Reviews.Review: I looked everywhere for a swim top. I could not find anything at the regular stores, you know the usual. My mom said that I should look at JC Penney because there was a better selection. She wasnt kidding! I tried on a couple of swim tops and found exactly what I was looking for. The fit is perfect and it matches the bottoms that I currently have. I am going on vacation soon and I am excited about wearing my new swim outfit!!
I think this item is good for someone that isnt as tiny as they would like to be, hides the less attractive parts.
true to size, sliming, and a great value, lots of styles to chose from, very satisfied

name_title: Azul By Maxine Of Hollywood Foiled Again Empire-Waist Swimdress - Plus
description: Bold and chic, this empire-waist swimdress will complement your curves and have you beach-ready in no time. tank straps built-in soft cups partially lined nylon/elastane hand wash, line dry imported

Reviews.Review: I absolutely LOVE this swimdress!!! Im 32 and usually its hard to find plus size bathing suits that arent hideous with a bunch of flowers on it or matronly. But this swimdress is AWESOME! The empire waist is very flattering and hides all the trouble areas. The color is vibrant and the silver part is actually more shiny than you see in the pics. You can really tell that the material is not cheap as well. This is the first bathing suit Ive bought in YEARS that I absolutely LOVE! Cant wait to wear it! HIGHLY RECOMMEND!

name_title: Azul By Maxine Of Hollywood Foiled Again Empire-Waist Swimdress - Plus
description: Bold and chic, this empire-waist swimdress will complement your curves and have you beach-ready in no time. tank straps built-in soft cups partially lined nylon/elastane hand wash, line dry imported

Reviews.Review: I absolutely LOVE this swimdress!!! Im 32 and usually its hard to find plus size bathing suits that arent hideous with a bunch of flowers on it or matronly. name_title: Azul By Maxine Of Hollywood Foiled Again Shirred 1-pc. Swimsuit
description: Bold and chic, this shirred one-piece swimsuit will complement your curves and have you beach-ready in no time. tank straps built-in soft cups tummy control partially lined nylon/elastane hand wash, line dry imported

Reviews.Review: Anything NOT black is always a welcome sight when Im shopping for suits. I bought this suit to wear in the jacuzzi at the gym. Since there always seems to be more men than women there, I looked for a suit with maximum coverage -- at my age and as a married lady, I dont want to look like Im trying too hard.

Ive always appreciated the quality that Maxine of Hollywood suits have consistently delivered. The suit is true to size -- I usually wear a 10, and the 10 fit properly everywhere. Strong straps that stay in place and great bust support; pulls in the tummy and the seat stays put. Overall, a conservative but figure flattering design.

When the suit arrived, I was pleasantly surprised that the pretty paisley print fabric is much more rich and exotic than it looks in the photo; the description says black but this is definitely more on the burgundy/maroon side.

I really like this suit, fit etc. However the deep colors that were represented are not how the suit looked. I returned it and bought a black and white. Very pretty.I ordered this online with a coupon. I do feel the coupon should have applied on the 2nd order as well.

I usually dont feel confident in a bathing suit but this one did well to hide the extra weight I carry in my midsection. Helps to hold it in and gives a nice shape. Also very comfortable and good quality material. It has a gathered seam that goes down the front to give it a little bit of unique style. Its not just a plain grandma-like one piece, its really cute.

First, I like the cut of the legs -- the high-cut type are not for me. Secondly, the neckline works for me so I do not have to buy a special mastectomy swimsuit. The suit is well-made & helps flatten my stomach. I have bought this before in black, and it is great!
I love this style---the legs go all the way down my hips, covering my saddle bags. Without this my only alternative was a skirted suit.
Very pleased with modest style and the fit. The black is more marroon than black whichI like also. Great value for the sale priceI I paid.
finally found a bathing suit that fit me and doesnt skimp on the places you need the most. I love it and I am coming back to buy another one. Thanks

I am 53, 145 lbs, and wear a size 10 pant. I bought a size 12 swimsuit and it fits perfectly. The straps are thick for chest support, small fabric creases for flattering the mommy tummy, and it sits just above the thighs for good bottom coverage. Best of all, the neck is higher cut so the girls are not making a debut. I love the vibrant colors, fast shipping, and am very pleased with my purchase.

name_title: Azul by Maxine of Hollywood Print 1-Piece Swimdress - Plus
description: Head to the beach with confidence in our flattering black-and-white print knit swimdress. soft cups partially lined nylon/LYCRA® spandex hand wash, line dry imported

Reviews.Review: This bathing suit fits and looks great on. Its so hard to find cloths. I dont want to dress like a teenager but I also dont wont to dress like an old lady.
This bathingsuit feels soo comfortable. There is no pullling, creaping or pinching. Love it!

I love how this suit fits. If I had to have a complaint Id like for the skirt to be slightly longer. The shoulder straps are wider than others that Ive had which makes it so much more comfortable. I would buy again!

I love my swimsuit because it fits good without any adjustment. This an area of concern because I usually have to make some adjustment. I love the design of the fabric which makes my waist look smaller. I always recommend JC Penny to all my friends because I know the product /s I am purchasing is the best and they stand behind there merchandise.

I love everything from the waist down. Im a large bodied lady but not large busted so the top is a might too big for me. I kept the bathing suit because I cant seem to find one that fits perfectly in a one piece.

This suit seems to be of good quality and fits true to size. My issue with this suit is that there is simply too much skirt. Its voluminous. Because of the excess fabric in the skirt, swimming will be uncomfortable, and it also looks very old-fashioned. I returned it.

Im going to exchange this. I love it but I found some stitching problems that could call cause future problems. Hopefully they will have another one as I will be disappointed because its a great suit!
i had to get a size larger due to my generous bust size, but overall, flattering bathing suit.

name_title: Azul by Maxine of Hollywood Print 1-Piece Swimdress - Plus
description: Head to the beach with confidence in our flattering black-and-white print knit swimdress. soft cups partially lined nylon/LYCRA® spandex hand wash, line dry imported

name_title: Azul by Maxine of Hollywood Print 1-Piece Swimdress - Plus
description: The vibrant print and flattering styling of our v-neck swimdress will keep you feeling confident and comfortable throughout the season. soft cups partially lined nylon/LYCRA® spandex hand wash, line dry imported

Reviews.Review: As a woman of a certain age and weight, Ive always been discouraged in the hunt for a swimsuit that I wouldnt hate being seen in! I ordered this online, sight unseen and prepared myself for the worst. The price was so reasonable that I figured if I hated the suit, I could still keep it around for an emergency swim with my non-judgmental grandchildren. Imagine my surprise when it arrived and I took it out of the package, cringing the entire time. Gasp!!! It fit! It fit extremely well, possibly even could have gone a size smaller, but it really did fit great! Not only that -- It looked GOOD! Even in front of a full length mirror! Now I was doing my happy dance! I actually opened the door to show my husband and he responded with Wow! Honey you look awesome in that! I would buy this flattering, feminine suit again in a heartbeat! :-)

Its nice to have a swimsuit I feel comfortable in. Good selection and variety of colors. In the stores just in time for my vacation to the coast. Also purchased flip-flops to match........... What else is there to say ,,, my size was shipped to the catalog department quickly and it fit. Yahoo!
This swimsuit looks figure flattering and is very comfortable. It is durable too and stands up to pool games with the grandkids. I cannot say enough how much I love this swimsuit
this product is comfortable and seems to wear well ..great for the price ..i can always depend on JC Pennys
Havent bought a bathing suit for a few years. Found this one to be comfortable and fit well.

Purchased this suit for our vacation to the lake, loved it! Very comfortable fit! Would recommend trying on in the store first if available....my normal size fit, but I went up a size just for my own comfort. Excellent quality material, isnt flimsy, has a lot of support. Great value for the price!
I like the style and cut of the suit. It makes me less self conscience about my size
I love the fit, love the look and style and color. it will be exactly right at the resort i am wearing it to this August.

name_title: Azul by Maxine of Hollywood Print 1-Piece Swimdress
description: Head to the beach with confidence in our flattering black-and-white print knit swimdress. soft cups partially lined nylon/LYCRA® spandex hand wash, line dry imported

Reviews.Review: This swimsuit was awesome for a pool party I attended and one I now have on rotation to many functions such as pool parties and trips to the river. Its one of my new faves!
Fits perfectly. Length is good. Camouflages the areas the that I do not want to bring attention to. Cannot wait to wear it on my vacation

THE BATHING SUIT FITS PERFECT. LOVE THE SKIRT PART. IT FITS REALLY NICE IN THE CHEST AREA AND AROUND THE TOP OF THE LEGS AND THE STRAPS WERE TIGHT AND HELD EVERYTHING UP JUST THE WAY I LIKE IT. VERY NICE, SO GLAD I FOUND THAT SUIT. VERY HAPPY WITH THE PRODUCT.
Fit beautifully, true to size, delivered on time to favorite store.
Tried on several suits. This suit fits great, but it does come a little small so I had to get the next size up from my normal clothes.
Look forward to the pool!
Bought this swimdress and love it. I am plus size but this is a slimming look and fits perfect. Thank You.

I loved this swimdress but for some reason it made my boobs separate and created side boobs! I wanted to love this but my boobs looked weird. Im top heavy and it was a great fit but my boobs just would separate and go to each side. I will try some more Azul but I think maybe it is just that swimdress. I dont know. Its sad I really wanted to like this but couldnt.
Fits great and looks wonderful on. Will be great at the pool or on vacation

name_title: Azul by Maxine of Hollywood Print 1-Piece Swimdress
description: The vibrant print and flattering styling of our v-neck swimdress will keep you feeling confident and comfortable throughout the season. soft cups partially lined nylon/LYCRA® spandex hand wash, line dry imported

Reviews.Review: Skirt is longer than most, dress hangs off of the bust line so it hides a multitude of sins

I have been wearing this style for YEARS, and ALWAYS find it at JC Penney!!! The skirt, the bodice, EVERYTHING about this style is always so comfortable, both in the pool and lounging about before, during and after sunning & swimming!!
I like how it fits, A beautiful color too, washes really easy ! I would recommend this swim suit to others ! You wont go wrong!!
I love this suit and the way it fits. I actually ordered another of same brand and style with different pattern because I loved this one so much.
I like one piece suits with a skirt which are not easy to find. This one checks all the boxes. Its made of a nice material, washes well and feels good on. I like the attractive print too.
Its just great. Lovely colors, perfect fit. What else can I say?
I love how this swimsuit fits and the beautiful colors arent washing out at all. Very slimming design , this is definitely my favorite one!
I read the reviews on this swimming suit before purchasing and bought it based on the reviews! I am happy to report that this is a great swimming suit and fits very well. I would totally recommend!

name_title: Azul by Maxine of Hollywood Print Tankini Swim Top or Solid Bottoms

Reviews.Review: Love this swim top looks great with my bikini blue bottoms

I brought this for my granddaughter ,She has a large bust for her age and was very uncomfortable in a lot of the other suits we tried on. This one great scoop neck layer look not exposing her bust or making her look bigger. This was a great buy . She is very picky and she loves this.
This top is forgiving and looks goon on. Love the colors in the fabric. Comfortable fit
These are well made and I need extra support which they provide
The top fits good and is comfortable to wear. I like the adjustable straps.
This top is exactly what I was looking for, fits great!
i was worried about the bust area being not too supportive but its a good fit. very comfy!

I got this takini top on sale and it is very complimentary to my figure. This top disguises my stomach and still has a cute look for a 60 yr old woman. I swim alot in summer so I need a few tops. This one is great.

name_title: Azul by Maxine of Hollywood Shirred-Front 1-Piece Swimsuit - Plus
description: Flattering front shirring and classic girl-leg styling give our 1-piece swimsuit perfect poolside polish. tummy control soft cups fully lined nylon/LYCRA® spandex hand wash, line dry imported

Reviews.Review: Looks great on me. Hides my muffin top. Great value.
fits in all the right places love it .I use in for all water sports
This is a nice swimsuit. It fits well. I like the coverage it provides.
I would Highly recommend this brand,the styling fits just right and you don,t feel like you will fall out of it...very comfortable and the material is top notch!

I ordered the black/white because reviews said the blue was smaller. Probably could have used it. Small bust, but OK. Material looser than lycra, but should last longer. Works fine with water aerobics.

The fabric is very comfortable. The animal print is very chic and becoming. I love this boy leg style of bathing suit. It give better coverage around the brief/crouch area of the woman;s body frame. All areas of the lower body are securely covered, nothing is exposed. I normally wear a womens plus size 18, but I ordered a womans plus size 16, based on a previous review of this bathing suit. The size 16 fit perfectly. I was very surprised and pleased with this product.
Swimsuits are one of those items that are sometimes difficult to find that fit and feel perfect. I love, love love my new swimsuit! Knew instantly when I tried it on, that it was the one!

I wanted a suit that didnt have a skirt and was easy to move in so that I could wear it to workout in my pool each day. After using it a couple of times I have to say I really like it. Because I have a long torso I did buy a size larger then I wear and it fits fine for my use.

name_title: Azul by Maxine of Hollywood Shirred-Front Girl-Leg 1-Piece Swimsuit - Plus
description: Flattering front shirring and classic girl-leg styling give our 1-piece swimsuit perfect poolside polish. soft cups fully lined nylon/LYCRA® spandex hand wash, line dry imported

Reviews.Review: Looks good and others say the same. The material feels very nice and will probably last a long time.
Pretty and well made. The colors are bright and vivid.

This suit has wonderful bust support, shirring for tummy control, and stays put during vigorous exercise. It is comfortable, dries quickly, and was fairly priced. I bought a second one in the black and white and love them both.
The suit is true to size and fits very comfortably.
I really like the color & fit. I needed it foe my swimmming excerices

cute suit...love the shirred front, more flattering than some of the other suits pulled tight across the middle...runs a little large, but good support on top...I found the legs a little uncomfortable across the front, but nothing too bothersome...I would buy this suit again.

name_title: Azul by Maxine of Hollywood Shirred-Front Spa 1-Piece Swimsuit
description: Showcase your classic style at your next pool party or beachside getaway with our 1-piece knit swimsuit, designed with flattering front shirring and subtle shaping details.   molded soft cups powernet tummy control panel chlorine resistant partially lined polyester hand wash, line dry imported

Reviews.Review: I am so enjoying the class, coverage, and flattering style of this suit! Avery good quality product as well !
It was a very nice suit, but it was falling off my shoulders. Way too large in chest and shoulders. I would recommend it if it fit the person.
It fits well and and looks flattering. It is comfortable and has a slimming effect.

I like the fact that this swimsuit is chlorine resistant, per the product description. I hope that this feature holds true as chlorine causes swimsuits to deteriorate quickly. If this suits lasts longer than my other suits, the price (though more than I usually pay for a swimsuit) will be worth the extra money.
This suit is the most uncomfortable suit I have ever worn. The material is so thick it feels like you have a wool suit on. It makes you itch. Does not give, very restricting.
This suit fit my teen daughter perfectt, Its a modest fit that Mom loves too!
The swimsuit is very good quality material. Very comfortable fit.
I bought this, hoping it was similar to another one I had purchased at JC Penney years ago. However, the fabric is tough and scratchy, and I did not find it comfortable.

name_title: Azul by Maxine of Hollywood Solid Hipster Swim Bottoms
description: Make the most of your swim wardrobe with our versatile solid-color hipster bottoms that will coordinate with almost any swim top. nylon/LYCRA® spandex hand wash, line dry imported

Reviews.Review: These are well made and I need extra support which they provide

These swim bottoms fit very well and are extremely comfortable in and out of the water. There is no problem with them riding up or becoming uncomfortable when in the water. I would recommend them to anyone.
I like this style - not really revealing, but still allows you to wear any top with it.

IT is so hard for me to order online. Sizes and fits can be so different. I love these swim bottoms and really wished that they came in a few more basic colors (brown and navy). The leg openings are snug and stay down with good coverage. The waistband is higher, without being ridiculous, and most important - it does not roll down. It is great for providing support for my curvy figure. I will keep an eye out in case more colors become available.

name_title: Azul By Maxine Of Hollywood® Stripe It Or Not Bandeau Blouson Tankini Swim Top or Hipster Swim Bottoms - Plus

Reviews.Review: This bathing suit is very comfortable and I am very happy with my purchase!!

Been looking for board shorts for WOMEN for many seasons. Very happy to find these. Actually prefer this type of zipper/snap front closer verses the lace up. Much easier. Dry fast (better than frilly skirts), nice coverage but not too much.
I plan to wear these on a beach vacation, but I havent been yet. I like the length and I think they will dry faster than most swimsuit bottoms.

GREAT shorts. Longer than swim skirts - for those of us that live in the pool months at a time. Panty in the shorts makes them modest but still oh so cute. Perfect to match with the fabulous swim tops offered by JCP. And I searched for HOURS for a great set of shorts. Bought 2.
Just like every other woman of size on this planet, I hate to shop for a bathing suit....was pleasantly surprised when the swim shorts fit! Hooray!
I like the style and quality of these swim shorts. Fit was true to size. Only gave a 4 because I have not worn them in the water yet.
I love this swim bottom - fits guns true to size. I bought it on sale and it was a steal!
I wanted something comfortable to swim in and at the same time would give me the leg coverage that I wanted in a swimsuit bottom. This did both.

Reviews.Review: i love this swim top it fits true to size and looks very flattering

name_title: Azul by Maxine of Hollywood Tankini Swim Top or Skirted Bottoms

Reviews.Review: I looked everywhere for a swim top. I could not find anything at the regular stores, you know the usual. My mom said that I should look at JC Penney because there was a better selection. She wasnt kidding! I tried on a couple of swim tops and found exactly what I was looking for. The fit is perfect and it matches the bottoms that I currently have. I am going on vacation soon and I am excited about wearing my new swim outfit!!
I think this item is good for someone that isnt as tiny as they would like to be, hides the less attractive parts.
true to size, sliming, and a great value, lots of styles to chose from, very satisfied

name_title: Azul by Maxine of Hollywood Tiered Tankini Swim Top or Boardshorts - Plus

Reviews.Review: Love it! Looks great! Meets all of my needs in a swimsuit!
I liked the look of this product, but when I tried it on I thought it looked like a maternity top. I felt that it made me look larger all over and it overemphasized the bust..

Been looking for board shorts for WOMEN for many seasons. Very happy to find these. Actually prefer this type of zipper/snap front closer verses the lace up. Much easier. Dry fast (better than frilly skirts), nice coverage but not too much.
I plan to wear these on a beach vacation, but I havent been yet. I like the length and I think they will dry faster than most swimsuit bottoms.
Very pretty and fits well. Would have loved a different color for the skirt. Only black and turquoise to choose from. Would also like more of a choice in swimwear for plus size women.

This is absolutely beautiful. I love the pastel, cheerful colors and love the way it flows. It covers those areas (like the tummy) very well. It also is so beautiful as either a bathing suit top or just to wear around during the warmer days. Yep, love it!
Bought these shorts to wear over swim bottoms while on boat with friends. The size is a little big but they are super comfortable and cover all the right areas.

I bought one of these tankinis and it fit and looked so good I put my best foot forward and bought a 2nd. I had coupons and discounts so the 2nd one was a true value. I would recommend this top whether you are a size 8 or a 24W. it looks great, feels great and I get lots of compliments in it. btw, I wear a 24W.

description: Feminine and fun, this faux-skirtini swimdress will suit your style to a tee. tank straps built-in soft cups partially lined nylon/elastane hand wash, line dry imported

Reviews.Review: I just bought this suit at the store and LOVE it. I didnt think I could find a suit I could feel good wearing, but in this one I do. It covers well, is comfy and the bright colors are pretty.
I have a difficult time finding bathing suits to fit my body type and this brand fits very well. It is comfortable and I love the colors.
This was exactly what I was searching for! Perfect for my upcoming family vacation. I highly recommend this swimdress!
This suit fits great and covers well for some one who is self conscious and its cute! I am very pleased with it. I am also happy with the price I paid for it and it is very well made.

name_title: Azul by Maxine Of Hollywood Tropi-Call Me Faux-Skirtini Swimdress
description: Feminine and fun, this faux-skirtini swimdress will suit your style to a tee. tank straps built-in soft cups partially lined nylon/elastane hand wash, line dry imported

Reviews.Review: This swimsuit is great and comfortable. I have gotten lots of complements on it.

This one piece swimsuit I bought is just perfect for me. The colors are so vibrant and beautiful and the top hangs over my waist hiding the area that bothers me the most, (my stomach). Even though this swimsuit is one piece, its very sexy and catches the eyes of those onlookers.
I like the style and comfort and look forward to wearing it at the beach this summer.
I love the way this bathing suit fits! It was on sale plus I had a coupon, so the price was reasonable.
Held up great after days at the beach with 2 rambunctious grandsons!
Shopped on line as they did not have my size in store.Good colors, nice fit, good priceReceive quickly in good condition
Comfort, Style and Great Price what a great deal with great value

name_title: Azzure 2-Pack Decorative Pillows
description: Rich hues and embroidered accents on this two pack of decorative pillows are an easy yet exquisite way to brighten up your room.     embroidered accents measures 20x20"   Cotton with polyester fill. Spot clean. Imported.

Reviews.Review: Pillows were a great price just dont like the material for indoors. The material is a rough canvas like outdoors pillows would be

name_title: Baby B’gosh® 2-pc. Embroidered Babydoll Set - Baby Girls newborn-24m
description: Pretty florals and ruffles lend charm to this darling embroidered top and bloomers set. includes cap-sleeve top and bloomers top: embroidered yoke, fully lined, back-button closure bottom: tiered ruffle, cinched waist 100% cotton washable imported

Reviews.Review: I bought this 2 piece outfit for my granddaughter. Its really cute and perfect for the summer. The top, although made of cotton is a bit on the thin side and so are the bottoms. The colors in them are pretty. I cant wait to see her in this outfit!!
This lil outfit is cute as can be! I purchased a size 24 months for our petite 4 year old granddaughter. Fits great! Excellent quality as always...

Bought this for my daughter, I have not yet put it on but looks like will fit just right..as one review sayd shirt has no stretch but bottom does my daughter is 2months old but gaining weight so Im sure will fit just fine once I put this on her.i love carters clothing aswell they alwys havr cute styles and the durability of material they last long.

It is a cute outfit! I had my daughters Easter pictures done with this outfit on. I would say if your baby is more on the chunky size I would say size up the blouse has no stretch. But the bloomers had stretch.
Quality material, nice bright floral design. I feel like you have to go a size up with oshkosh, but still really cute none the less.
I absolutely love this outfit. It is so cute and girly. It is one of my Oshkosh favorites.
I absolutely love this outfit! Its light and airy perfect for summer. It is sweet and girly.. Great outfit!
Exactly what I would expect from a baby bgosh outfit. Beautiful and simple. This is a gift for a baby shower but makes me miss when my little one fit in the baby bgosh.

name_title: Baby B’gosh® Anchor Print Bodysuit - Baby Boys newborn-24m
description: This soft, all-cotton bodysuit takes the guesswork out of dressing him by perfectly layering with his jeans, khakis and shorts. all-over anchor print short sleeves nickel-free snaps on reinforced panel jersey knit fabric 100% cotton washable imported

Reviews.Review: Great onesie. Material is soft and feels comfortable. Cute pattern. Fits well as sized. Great for summer!
extremely cute!. Nice fabric and design. A little wider than others

I like the cotton fabric of this shirt. You cant see in the photo that the fabric is not just smooth cotton knit. It is slightly textured, which is nice. Also, you cant tell from the picture that some of the circle tops on the anchors are filled in red so it is not just blue and white as I expected. The red accents make the design more interesting. I also like that the shirt is off-white not bright white. Very nice product.
I love the design on this anchor shirt but it is way too wide. If it was like the other shirts i bought from ohkosh it would give it 5 stars.

I bought this for next spring/summer. Its very soft and washed up great. Although its hard to see in the picture, it has some red coloring in the anchors. I gave it only four stars because it seems to fit a little wide and I prefer more long and lean styles for my sons long body.
This was perfect for my grandson! It matches his nursery theme and is soft and comfortable for him.

name_title: Baby B’gosh® Cap-Sleeve Floral Dress - Baby Girls newborn-24m
description: A cheerful floral print energizes this all-cotton dress and matching diaper cover. includes matching diaper cover cap sleeves pin-tuck details back button closure embroidered picot hem fully lined 100% cotton washable imported

Reviews.Review: Purchase as a gift. It was a good value because it was on sale and then an additional coupon was applied. Cute.
